{"id":1479661975,"question_id":2917,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734291153,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1479661975/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Pairs Whose Sum is Less than Target","memory":"24.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countPairs(vector<int>& nums, int target) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int count = 0;\n        int l = 0;\n        int r = nums.size()-1;\n        while(l<r) {\n            if(nums[l]+nums[r]<target) {\n                count += r-l;\n                l++;\n            } else\n                r--;\n        }\n        return count;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-pairs-whose-sum-is-less-than-target","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
